title.narrative: # of women and youth involved in politics who feel they are able to participate in decision-making processes

description.narrative: # of women and youth involved in politics who feel they are able to participate in decision-making processes

comment.narrative: 51 Participants out of 81 feel that they are able to participate in decision-making processes. The remaining 30 participants are also women and young participants, who we are also reinforcing their knowledge and skills that will allow them to access to leadership positions

In 2025, CEMI will have in its network, 90% of ALUMNI who will be participating in internal decision making process of their structure; and the executive bureaus of the organizations who took part the CEMI's activities would have at least 30% of its members composed of CEMI’s ALUMNI. There will be approx 70 alumni per year, so 350 by 2025, so target is 315

title.narrative: # of women and youth involved in politics who feel they are able to participate in decision-making processes

description.narrative: # of women and youth involved in politics who feel they are able to participate in decision-making processes

comment.narrative: REGIONAL: 17 representatives of CSO’s and political actors from Jordan, Lybia and Iraq

REGIONAL: In 2025,CEMI would have organized around 10 Regional activities for nearly 250 participants from the Arab regions. From these 250 Participants, CEMI would be able to capacitate around 75 participants to be able to participate in decision-making processes.

title.narrative: # of CSOs with increased organizational capacities (youth led)

description.narrative: # of CSOs with increased organizational capacities (youth led)

comment.narrative: Generally, the structures of the movements and organizations are not making the most of the capacity building of their members who participate in the various trainings offered by Tunisian CSOs.

At the end of the year, all the participants to the ToT Class, who had been very good capacitated by following 2 years of training session (Political science and Public policies) and will strengthen their movements or organizations by organizing internal training sessions for their activist
7 Participants represent 7 organizations out of 13 organizations were represented by youth with increased organizational capacities from mixed classes

title.narrative: # of CSOs included in the PoD programme (youth led)

description.narrative: # of CSOs included in the PoD programme (youth led)

comment.narrative: Generally, the structures of the movements and organizations are not making the most of the capacity building of their members who participate in the various trainings offered by Tunisian CSOs.
The numbers of CSOs included in the PoD programme (youth led)may increase in the event that there would be internal elections and some organizations would be led by youth.
3 organizations leaded by youth are included in POD program it is the same number of organizations that CEMI worked with from the beginning of the year

description.narrative: # of CSOs with increased organizational capacities (women led)

comment.narrative: REGIONAL: In the Regional Academy, 5women leaders were present and trained out of 17 youth participants from Jordan, Libya and Iraq and 1 out of the 5 organization has increased organizational capacities.

REGIONAL:• 5 out of 17 CSOs with increased organizational capacities (youth led);At the end of the year,CEMI will set up a monitoring process to follow how the participants are strengthening their movements and organizations and will try to implement activities that will keep them always in relation with the CEMI to get more capacity building.
2 organizations with increased organizational capacities were present in regional seminar and regional Academy

title.narrative: 2.2 Y&W leaders lobby and advocate in decision-making spaces
2.2 Y&W leaders lobby and advocate in decision-making spaces

description.narrative: 2.2 Youth and women leaders lobby and advocate in decision-making spaces
2.2 Youth and women leaders lobby and advocate in decision-making spaces

title.narrative: # of women/youth leaders trained

description.narrative: # of women/youth leaders trained

comment.narrative: Although there are 51 women and youth leaders trained from all the classes but only 20 feel that they are lobbying and advocating in decision-making, the rest of the Young and women leaders (31) feel that they still need some capacity reinforcement in order to overcome certain limits and become leaders who will be lobbying and advocating in decision-making.

Through CEMI's activities by building the capacities of the participants, this will not only help the leaders to minimize their limits so that they would lobby and advocate in decision-making but also creating new leaders with a very strong personality and very in-depth knowledge allowing them to them too, to lobby and advocate in decision-making.
31 womens leaders trained out 73 participants trained from mixed classes and ToT and 48 youth leaders participants from mixed classes and ToT

title.narrative: # of representatives (male/female) of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities (e.g. democracy schools

description.narrative: # of representatives (male/female) of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities (e.g. democracy schools

comment.narrative: Apart from traditional channels, such as meetings organized by organizations or the media with its various distribution channels, the access to women and youth is a bit limited so that they would be able to amplify diverse young and women voices. CEMI has planned in its activities, two channels (Web radio and Youtube channel) in order to offer women and young leaders participating in training cycles to have the possibility to amplify diverse young and women voices.

There is no major changes for 2021, due to the Covid situation and all the restrictions we faced but the Web radio and Youtube channel will start early 2022, and will be assessed mid 2022 on 2021 participants so that at least 50% of the participants would be able to amplify diverse young and women voices.
73 participants of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities (e.g. democracy schools).

title.narrative: # of women/youth leaders trained

description.narrative: # of women/youth leaders trained

comment.narrative: REGIONAL: 5 out of 17 women/youth leaders trained; Lobbying and advocating is still not the strongest competence among youth and women in the countries such as Libya, Jordan or Iraq, for cultural reasons where generally it is the older ones who have the last say.

REGIONAL: 7 out of 17 women/youth leaders would be lobbying and advocating in decision-making. Through the Regional activities, CEMI will build the capacities of the participants, this will not only help the leaders to minimize their limits so that they would lobby and advocate in decision-making but also creating new leaders with a very strong personality and very in-depth knowledge allowing them too, to lobby and advocate in decision-making.
During the regional activities realized in 2021, 8 women leaders were present and trained out of 33 participants were present to lobby and advocacy in decision making

title.narrative: 3.1 Political and civic actors address grievances
3.1 Political and civic actors address grievances

description.narrative: 3.1 Political and civic actors address grievances through mediation
3.1 Political and civic actors address grievances through mediation

title.narrative: # of agreements reached (reform agendas / policies / legal amendments)

description.narrative: # of agreements reached (reform agendas / policies / legal amendments)

comment.narrative: 2 achievements: the members discussed the amendment to electoral law and the majority bonus and a five% electoral threshold)/1 TSoP debate/1 Couscous politique

Due to Covid situation, it was very difficult to organize some activities in the first semester of 2021 in relation to this theory of change but CEMI will overcome some constraints and will helping political and civic actors to build a climate of trust and minimize grievances by organizing the planned and dedicated type of interventions. In 2021, CEMI will organize the 4 MDP meetings planned and will try to help them achieving 2 agreements during the second semester 2021. CEMI will also organize 5 TSoP debates and 3 couscous politique which will target 100 other actors who benefit from dialogue and mediation activities.
3 agreements were reached in the first semester during the MDP meetings and 1 agreement was reached for the second semester after the 17 Youth Collaborative Platform meetings held

title.narrative: # of civic/political actors trained in dialogue/mediation

description.narrative: # of civic/political actors trained in dialogue/mediation

comment.narrative: 32 participants in couscous politique, 8 MDP participants, TSoP debate 52 participants

100 civic/political actors trained in dialogue/mediation; In 2021, CEMI will organize the 4 MDP meetings planned and will try to help them achieving 2 agreements during the second semester 2021. CEMI will also organize 5 TSoP debates and 3 couscous politique which will target 100 other actors who benefit from dialogue and mediation activities.

3 couscous were held during this year: 1 in the first semester and 2 for the second one. So, for this year there was 87 participants from political and civic actors were present in the 3 events of couscous politique and 217 participants for the 6 TSoP debates realized and 25 participants from youth collaborative platform were present during the 17 meetings realized online, face to face and hybrid. So during this year, 329 participants were present in all dialogue activities realized with 3 agreements noticed in this year.

title.narrative: 3.2 Political and civic actors build trust
3.2 Political and civic actors build trust

description.narrative: 3.2 Political and civic actors build trust to enable alliances across political divides
3.2 Political and civic actors build trust to enable alliances across political divides

title.narrative: # of representatives (male/female) of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities (e.g. democracy schools

description.narrative: # of representatives (male/female) of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities (e.g. democracy schools

comment.narrative: 2 interparty dialogue meetings were held in the first semester with the participation of 8 representatives of political parties and 52 representatives were present in TSoP debate. Regarding MDP meetings, the CEMI determines moderates and facilitates an issue on which the meeting will focus.

8 interparty dialogue meetings and an estimated number of 100 representatives of political actors will participate in TSoP Debate in the second part of the year. the dialogues will mainly focus on the respect for the rule of law and the achievements made since the revolution as well as all the thematic that would be built and reinforce the trust between all the stakeholders.

1 TSoP debate realized in the first semester with 51 represntatives,18 male and 23 female and 5 TSoP debates in the second semester with the participation of 166 representatives of political actors and civic society, 84 female and 80 male in which the CEMI chose themes related to the actual situation. So in 2021, 20 representatives were present during the 3 MDP meetings realized and 217 representatives during the 6 TSoP debates

title.narrative: # of interparty dialogue meetings (at national level)

description.narrative: # of interparty dialogue meetings (at national level)

comment.narrative: According to the experts and to the political scan done by CEMI, it has been noticed that the current electoral law does not promote the building of trust to allow alliances, that's why CEMI, through its activities, is consulting some experts in this field, in order to advocate in changing the electoral law, by promoting dialogue between stakeholders in collaboration with CEMI.

8 interparty dialogue meetings and an estimated number of 100 representatives of political actors will participate in TSoP Debate in the second part of the year. the dialogues will mainly focus on the respect for the rule of law and the achievements made since the revolution as well as all the thematic that would be built and reinforce the trust between all the stakeholders.

2 interparty dialogue meetings were held in the first semester with the participation of 8 political parties’ representatives for every meeting and 1 interparty dialogue meeting was held in the second semester with the participation of 4 representatives of political parties. So in 2021, 20 representatives were present during the 3 MDP meetings realized and 217 representatives during the 6 TSoP debates

title.narrative: 3.3 Political and civic actors participate in dialogue
3.3 Political and civic actors participate in dialogue

description.narrative: 3.3 Political and civic actors participate in meaningful dialogue
3.3 Political and civic actors participate in meaningful dialogue

title.narrative: # of interparty dialogue meetings (at national level)

description.narrative: # of interparty dialogue meetings (at national level)

comment.narrative: 4 interparty dialogue meetings have been realized at national level for the first semester of the year for political and civic actors representatives which are 2 interparty dialogue meetings 1 couscous politique and 1 TSoP debate.

A needs assessment will be organized at the end of the year in order to collect the maximum of information that would allow CEMI to readapt its curriculum and allow the stakeholders to always participate in meaningful dialogue with full ownership of the topics.

3 interparty dialogue meetings were held in the first semester with the participation of 8 political parties’ representatives for each meeting and1 interparty dialogue meeting was held in the second semester with the participation of 4 representatives of political parties. 3 couscous politiques with participation of 87 representatives and 3 MDP meetings with participation of 20 participants

title.narrative: # of inclusive policy-making processes (at national level)

description.narrative: # of inclusive policy-making processes (at national level)

comment.narrative: 169 multi-stakeholder dialogue meetings were held in the first semester to be a part of the inclusive policy-making processes at the national level

In 2025, CEMI would have organized around 2000 multi-stakeholder dialogue meetings during the five years and CEMI would advocate for some of them and present them to one of the parliament’s commissions.

title.narrative: # of created/opened spaces for women/youth (at national level)

description.narrative: # of created/opened spaces for women/youth (at national level)

comment.narrative: 2 created/opened spaces for women/youth (at national level)

Same as the baseline value, with a certain focus on the youth council which should produce deliverables at the end of the year. Taking into consideration the latest political changes, and as CEMI represents the space of inclusiveness, CEMI would provide all stakeholders with all the necessary expertise and logistics for them to collaborate peacefully together and set up and consolidate democratic values.
In 2021, CEMI created 4 opened spaces for women and youth which are: Youth council, mixed classes, Youth collaborative platform and Youtube channel

title.narrative: # of representatives (male/female) of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities (e.g. democracy schools

description.narrative: # of representatives (male/female) of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities (e.g. democracy schools

comment.narrative: 133 representatives of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities which are: 4 male and 7 female representatives of ToT, 33 male and 37 female participants from Group 14A+B, 30 male and 22 female representatives from TSoP debates.

70 representatives (35 male/ 35 female) of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities.As the number of participants who get trained remains the same, during the second semester CEMI will try to organize TSoP Debates for 70 new representatives from TSoP debates and will continue to improve their skills.

75 representatives (33 male/ 42 female) of political actors have participated in democratic values oriented training activities for 2021 which are: 4 male and 7 female representatives of ToT, 35 female and 29 male participants from Group 14A+B,TSoP1 . 217 participants 119 female and 98 male representatives from 6 TSoP debates realized during the year. Concerning the research cell, 7 policy papers, 10 policy briefs and 1 research have been produced as a part of our objective which is the engagement in democratic rules research cell: 20 produtcions between policy papers, policy briefs and research during the year
